SEARCH
Package com.dreamwork.exception

Class GlobalExceptionHandler

java.lang.Object
com.dreamwork.exception.GlobalExceptionHandler
@ControllerAdvice public class GlobalExceptionHandler extends Object
Handles errors that happen in the application and provides clear responses to clients.

This class uses Spring's ControllerAdvice annotation to catch errors from anywhere in the app. For each type of error, it sends a response with the HTTP status code, status message, and a description of what went wrong.

    • handleUserNotFoundException

      @ExceptionHandler(UserNotFoundException.class) @ResponseBody public ErrorResponse handleUserNotFoundException(UserNotFoundException e)
      Handles UserNotFoundException by returning an error response with HTTP status 404 (Not Found).
      Parameters:
      e - the exception that was thrown.
      Returns:
      an ErrorResponse with HTTP status 404 (Not Found) containing the reason, and error message.
